# rux-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot          | Description             |
| ------------- | ----------------------- |
| `"(default)"` | The container's content |
| `"footer"`    | The container's footer  |
| `"header"`    | The container's header  |
| `"tab-bar"`   | The container's tab bar |
| `"toolbar"`   | The container's toolbar |


## Shadow Parts

| Part          | Description                             |
| ------------- | --------------------------------------- |
| `"body"`      | The container's outside body element    |
| `"container"` | The container's outermost element       |
| `"footer"`    | The container's outside footer element  |
| `"header"`    | The container's outside header element  |
| `"tab-bar"`   | The container's outside tab bar element |
| `"toolbar"`   | The container's outside toolbar element |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name             | Description                  |
| ---------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--body-padding` | the container's body padding |
